channel.title: {PI} Telling an item in what slot it go's
channel.description:
I have succesfully added the dungeoneering cape into my client. But I'm clueless on how to place it in the cape slot.
I believe this is server sided?

item.title: {PI} Telling an item in what slot it go's
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Item.java (src>server>model>items>)

Put the id in the capes[] array (or something similar to capes)

Then open ItemAssistant, and post your wearItem() method.[/quote]

Thank you <3. Your post is appreciated.

Edit:

Read full topic
item.source: {PI} Telling an item in what slot it go's
